mapper.select: SELECT a.user_id, a.user_nm, a.user_dept_se_no, b.dept_nm as user_dept, a.user_telno, a.user_eml_addr, a.user_addr, a.user_aprv_yn FROM public."user" A LEFT JOIN public.dept B ON A.user_dept_se_no = B.dept_se_no ORDER BY a.user_aprv_yn
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO public."user"( user_id, user_nm, user_dept_se_no, user_eml_addr, user_telno, user_addr) VALUES ( #{user_id}, #{user_nm}, #{user_dept_se_no}, #{user_eml_addr}, #{user_telno}, #{user_addr})
mapper.select: SELECT a.user_id, a.user_nm, a.user_dept_se_no, b.dept_nm as user_dept, a.user_telno, a.user_eml_addr, a.user_addr, a.user_aprv_yn FROM public."user" A LEFT JOIN public.dept B ON A.user_dept_se_no = B.dept_se_no WHERE user_id=#{user_id}
